revision.comment: Format is no more a builtin function. Not sure if the page needs to be deleted now, ZScript might get some builtins later.
revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} [[ZScript]] has some exclusive builtin functions in addition to being backwards compatible with mathematical, trigonometry and random functions from [[DECORATE expressions]].
These functions are globally available and aren't assigned to a particular class. [[Category:ZScript guides]]
